Create Account

Guide

Choose any master password and secret phrase and write them down. Please note that QuantumSure CANNOT recover your master password if you lose it. Please remember to store your API Key after creating an account. You will need your API Key and Secret Phrase to login to your account from another machine. The generated key can be viewed at the bottom of the page after creation.

Store Password

Guide

Choose the password you want QuantumSure to securely store for you. The generated password ID can be viewed at the bottom of the page after the operation completes.

Vault

    Guide

    List all the Password IDs that QuantumSure currently stores for you. Please note that you still need to use your Master Password to decrypt these passwords in the Retrieve section.

    Retrieve

    Guide

    Choose the Password ID for your password that you want to safely decrypt and access on QuantumSure. Input the Master Password. The password will be viewable at the bottom section of the page if the operation is successful.

    Share with Team

    ?

    Guide

    Choose the Password ID for the password that you want to securely share with your team. Input the list of API Keys separated by commas for your team members. The share type can be either "password" or "oauth_token". Input the Master Password. The generated share tokens can be viewed at the bottom of the page after the successful completetion of the operation.

    Revoke Shared Password

    ?

    Guide

    Revoke the access privilege for one of the Share Tokens you created above. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page.

    Delete Shared Password

    ?

    Guide

    Permanently delete one of the Share Tokens you created above. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page.

    Use Shared Password

    Guide

    Access a password through the Share Token your team has created for you. Input the Share ID for the password you want to access and input YOUR Master Password. If the result of the operation is a success, the password can be viewed at the bottom of the page.

    Create Share Group

    ?

    Guide

    Create a Share Group to share passwords and access tokens with your team. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page, and a Group ID is generated on success.

    Add Member to Group

    ?

    Guide

    Add a member to your Share Group. Requires the Group ID and the API Key of your team member. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page.

    Remove Member from Group

    ?

    Guide

    Remove a member from the Share Group you created above. Requires the Group ID and the API Key of the intended member. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page.

    Revoke Share Group

    ?

    Guide

    Revoke the access privilege for every member of the Share Group you created above. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page.

    Delete Share Group

    ?

    Guide

    Permanently delete the Share Group you created above. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page.

    Share with Group

    ?

    Guide

    Share a password or access token with all members of your Share Group. Requires the Group ID, the Password ID obtained from the Vault section, the type of token (either password or oauth_token), and your Master Password. The result of the operation can be viewed at the bottom of the page. On success, it will generate a Share ID for each member of the group.

    Encrypt File for Me

    ?

    Guide

    This action will create an encrypted and quantum-secure equivalent file for your inputted file. It will then be stored on your device. Please keep it safe as it cannot be recovered by us since QuantumSure is NOT storing a copy of it.

    Encrypt File for Someone Else

    ?

    Guide

    This action will create an encrypted and quantum-secure equivalent file for your inputted file for the person whose API Key you are entering. It will then be stored on your device. You can then send it to them securely, and it can only be decrypted by them. Please keep it safe as it cannot be recovered by us since QuantumSure is NOT storing a copy of it.

    Decrypt File

    Guide

    This action will decrypt the quantum secure file that you created in the Encrypt File section and provide you with the decrypted version to download. It will then be stored on your device. Please keep it safe as it cannot be recovered by us since QuantumSure is NOT storing a copy of it. If the contents of the file are important or confidential, it is highly recommended to store them safely in external storage.

    Export Credentials

    Guide

    This action will create a txt file with your API Key and Encrypted Private Key, and download it on your current device. The file is being safely generated on your end, and QuantumSure does NOT know of its contents. Please keep the file safe from unauthorized view, or even better, create a hard copy of its contents and then delete the file.

    Backup Account

    ?

    Guide

    This action will store your encrypted private key on Oasis, a blockchain with encrypted and private transactions. Please note that you still need to remember your Master Password to retrieve all your stored passwords, and this action only stores the encrypted and safe versiob of your private key.

    Import Account

    ?

    Guide

    This action will fetch the encrypted private key corresponding to the entered API Key (if you have backed it up before), and then download the credentials as a text file on to your device. We recommend that you store this file at a safe location, or even better, note it down safely on a piece of paper, and then delete the file.

    Clear Account Data

    Guide

    This action will delete the API Key, Encrypted Private Key, and any other data stored in your browser as cache. Please note that this doesn't delete your QuantumSure account. It is recommended to use this feature on Public Computers or machines you share with other users.
